domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Lockdown was the right call to fight #coronavirus.

But we had a period of rules enforced without law,

Today’s rules may not have a sound legal basis,

And gaps between guidance and law have caused serious  enforcement problems

We need the exit plan now

https://t.co/0YGmcEYJJy
